subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Olli Maatta’s slap shot beat Michal Neuvirth with less than two minutes remaining, and the host Pittsburgh Penguins rallied past the Washington Capitals, 4-3.
snippet: Olli Maatta’s slap shot beat Michal Neuvirth with less than two minutes remaining, and the host Pittsburgh Penguins rallied past the Washington Capitals, 4-3.
